inclusion.criterion: intra-epithelial neoplasia of the cervix grade 3
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pelvic reconstructive surgery for pelvic organ prolapse or stress urinary incontinence
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: bacteriuria and clinical urinary tract symptoms, e.g. dysuria, frequency, urgency and stress incontinence before surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and flank pain. She has no history of recurrent UTI or underlying disease.
